00059 Reactor::Reactor() : m_mutex(), m_interrupt_in_progress(false) {
00060   struct sockaddr_in addr;
00061 
00062 #if defined(__linux__)
00063   if ((poll_fd = epoll_create(256)) < 0) {
00064     perror("epoll_create");
00065     exit(1);
00066   }
00067 #elif defined(__APPLE__)
00068   kqd = kqueue();
00069 #endif
00070 
00076   if ((m_interrupt_sd = socket(AF_INET, SOCK_DGRAM, 0)) < 0) {
00077     HT_ERRORF("socket() failure: %s", strerror(errno));
00078     exit(1);
00079   }
00080 
00081   // Set to non-blocking
00082   FileUtils::set_flags(m_interrupt_sd, O_NONBLOCK);
00083 
00084   // create address structure to bind to - any available port - any address
00085   memset(&addr, 0 , sizeof(sockaddr_in));
00086   addr.sin_family = AF_INET;
00087   addr.sin_addr.s_addr = inet_addr("127.0.0.1");
00088   addr.sin_port = 0;
00089 
00090   // bind socket
00091   if ((bind(m_interrupt_sd, (sockaddr *)&addr, sizeof(sockaddr_in))) < 0) {
00092     HT_ERRORF("bind() failure: %s", strerror(errno));
00093     exit(1);
00094   }
00095 
00096   // get the assigned address
00097   socklen_t namelen = sizeof(addr);
00098   getsockname(m_interrupt_sd, (sockaddr *)&addr, &namelen);
00099 
00100   // connect to ourself
00101   if (connect(m_interrupt_sd, (sockaddr *)&addr, sizeof(addr)) < 0) {
00102     HT_ERRORF("connect(interrupt_sd) failed - %s", strerror(errno));
00103     exit(1);
00104   }
00105 
00106 #if defined(__linux__)
00107   if (ReactorFactory::ms_epollet) {
00108 
00109     struct epoll_event event;
00110     memset(&event, 0, sizeof(struct epoll_event));
00111     event.events = EPOLLIN | EPOLLOUT | POLLRDHUP | EPOLLET;
00112     if (epoll_ctl(poll_fd, EPOLL_CTL_ADD, m_interrupt_sd, &event) < 0) {
00113       HT_ERRORF("epoll_ctl(%d, EPOLL_CTL_ADD, %d, EPOLLIN|EPOLLOUT|POLLRDHUP|"
00114                 "EPOLLET) failed : %s", poll_fd, m_interrupt_sd,
00115                 strerror(errno));
00116       exit(1);
00117     }
00118   }
00119   else {
00120     struct epoll_event event;
00121     memset(&event, 0, sizeof(struct epoll_event));
00122     if (epoll_ctl(poll_fd, EPOLL_CTL_ADD, m_interrupt_sd, &event) < 0) {
00123       HT_ERRORF("epoll_ctl(%d, EPOLL_CTL_ADD, %d, 0) failed : %s",
00124                 poll_fd, m_interrupt_sd, strerror(errno));
00125       exit(1);
00126     }
00127   }
00128 #endif
00129 
00130   memset(&m_next_wakeup, 0, sizeof(m_next_wakeup));
00131 }

00134 void Reactor::handle_timeouts(PollTimeout &next_timeout) {
00135   vector<ExpireTimer> expired_timers;
00136   EventPtr event_ptr;
00137   boost::xtime     now, next_req_timeout;
00138   ExpireTimer timer;
00139 
00140   {
00141     ScopedLock lock(m_mutex);
00142     IOHandler       *handler;
00143     DispatchHandler *dh;
00144 
00145     boost::xtime_get(&now, boost::TIME_UTC);
00146 
00147     while ((dh = m_request_cache.get_next_timeout(now, handler,
00148                                                   &next_req_timeout)) != 0) {
00149       handler->deliver_event(new Event(Event::ERROR, ((IOHandlerData *)
00150           handler)->get_address(), Error::REQUEST_TIMEOUT), dh);
00151     }
00152 
00153     if (next_req_timeout.sec != 0) {
00154       next_timeout.set(now, next_req_timeout);
00155       memcpy(&m_next_wakeup, &next_req_timeout, sizeof(m_next_wakeup));
00156     }
00157     else {
00158       next_timeout.set_indefinite();
00159       memset(&m_next_wakeup, 0, sizeof(m_next_wakeup));
00160     }
00161 
00162     if (!m_timer_heap.empty()) {
00163       ExpireTimer timer;
00164 
00165       while (!m_timer_heap.empty()) {
00166         timer = m_timer_heap.top();
00167         if (xtime_cmp(timer.expire_time, now) > 0) {
00168           if (next_req_timeout.sec == 0
00169               || xtime_cmp(timer.expire_time, next_req_timeout) < 0) {
00170             next_timeout.set(now, timer.expire_time);
00171             memcpy(&m_next_wakeup, &timer.expire_time, sizeof(m_next_wakeup));
00172           }
00173           break;
00174         }
00175         expired_timers.push_back(timer);
00176         m_timer_heap.pop();
00177       }
00178 
00179     }
00180   }
00181 
00185   for (size_t i=0; i<expired_timers.size(); i++) {
00186     event_ptr = new Event(Event::TIMER, Error::OK);
00187     if (expired_timers[i].handler)
00188       expired_timers[i].handler->handle(event_ptr);
00189   }
00190 
00191   {
00192     ScopedLock lock(m_mutex);
00193 
00194     if (!m_timer_heap.empty()) {
00195       timer = m_timer_heap.top();
00196       if (next_req_timeout.sec == 0
00197           || xtime_cmp(timer.expire_time, next_req_timeout) < 0) {
00198         next_timeout.set(now, timer.expire_time);
00199         memcpy(&m_next_wakeup, &timer.expire_time, sizeof(m_next_wakeup));
00200       }
00201     }
00202 
00203     poll_loop_continue();
00204   }
00205 
00206 }

00213 void Reactor::poll_loop_interrupt() {
00214 
00215   m_interrupt_in_progress = true;
00216 
00217 #if defined(__linux__)
00218 
00219   if (ReactorFactory::ms_epollet) {
00220 
00221     char buf[8];
00222     ssize_t n;
00223 
00228     if ((n = FileUtils::send(m_interrupt_sd, "1", 1)) < 0) {
00229       HT_ERRORF("send(interrupt_sd) failed - %s", strerror(errno));
00230       exit(1);
00231     }
00232 
00233     if ((n = FileUtils::recv(m_interrupt_sd, buf, 8)) == -1) {
00234       HT_ERRORF("recv(interrupt_sd) failed - %s", strerror(errno));
00235       exit(1);
00236     }
00237   }
00238   else {
00239 
00240     struct epoll_event event;
00241     memset(&event, 0, sizeof(struct epoll_event));
00242     event.events = EPOLLOUT;
00243     if (epoll_ctl(poll_fd, EPOLL_CTL_MOD, m_interrupt_sd, &event) < 0) {
00249     }
00250   }
00251 
00252 #elif defined(__APPLE__)
00253   struct kevent event;
00254 
00255   EV_SET(&event, m_interrupt_sd, EVFILT_WRITE, EV_ADD | EV_ENABLE, 0, 0, 0);
00256 
00257   if (kevent(kqd, &event, 1, 0, 0, 0) == -1) {
00258     HT_ERRORF("kevent(sd=%d) : %s", m_interrupt_sd, strerror(errno));
00259     exit(1);
00260   }
00261 #endif
00262 
00263 }

00270 void Reactor::poll_loop_continue() {
00271 
00272   if (!m_interrupt_in_progress)
00273     return;
00274 
00275 #if defined(__linux__)
00276 
00277   if (!ReactorFactory::ms_epollet) {
00278     struct epoll_event event;
00279 
00280     memset(&event, 0, sizeof(struct epoll_event));
00281     event.events = EPOLLERR | EPOLLHUP;
00282 
00283     if (epoll_ctl(poll_fd, EPOLL_CTL_MOD, m_interrupt_sd, &event) < 0) {
00284       HT_ERRORF("epoll_ctl(EPOLL_CTL_MOD, sd=%d) : %s", m_interrupt_sd,
00285                 strerror(errno));
00286       exit(1);
00287     }
00288   }
00289 
00290 #elif defined(__APPLE__)
00291   struct kevent devent;
00292 
00293   EV_SET(&devent, m_interrupt_sd, EVFILT_WRITE, EV_DELETE, 0, 0, 0);
00294 
00295   if (kevent(kqd, &devent, 1, 0, 0, 0) == -1 && errno != ENOENT) {
00296     HT_ERRORF("kevent(sd=%d) : %s", m_interrupt_sd, strerror(errno));
00297     exit(1);
00298   }
00299 #else
00300   ImplementMe();
00301 #endif
00302   m_interrupt_in_progress = false;
00303 }
